description:
The battle between the Egyptian Gods has begun!  When Yugi’s Slifer the Sky Dragon clashes against Kaiba’s Obelisk the Tormentor, what will happen when two Egyptian Gods fight each other?  It’s time to find out which Egyptian God is truly stronger!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 激突! 神[オシリス]VS神[オベリスク]
